inn1.comm: starts well, some movement away from the right hander, lands on a good length, Amla lets it go
closer to the off stump, opens the face to steer it down towards third man for a single, he's off
good length on the off, Smith gets behind it nicely and defends it back to the bowler
good length, just outside off, gets forward and crunches it wide of mid-off for a single
keeps low, seems slowish, short of a good length outside off, holds its line,  Amla leaves it alone
found the gap, short of a good length outside off, Amla gets back and plays his favourite punch through point and cover, races away and silences the crowd
short on the off stump and Smith drags it straight to midwicket, didn't time it well enough
short ball down the leg side, tries to tickle it fine does Smith, clips the thighs and they scramble for a couple
four, poor line from Rubel, full on the pads and it's flicked away past short fine leg for a boundary

appeal for lbw, short of a good length, hurries on to Smith who is struck on the thighs as he tries to play that off the back foot, seemed to be too high, Daryl Harper ruled it Not Out. Was struck on the knee roll was Smith, the Bangladeshis don't refer. It also pitched outside leg
short of a good length outside off, guided behind point for a single
Amla's looking good, just eased that through the game, a driving length, leans forward and just caresses it through the covers
good length on the off, gets a stride out and defends it with a full face back to the bowler
four more, straying on the pads is Shafiul, it's easy pickings for Smith who whips it away past short fine leg, poor line with such a field
goodish length on the off, that's the way to go, Smith gets forward and defends solidly
got him to drive at that one, was overpitched and Smith chased it, tried to cream it through the covers, got a thick outside edge down to third man

no stopping Amla, Amla receives an almost identical delivery to what Smith got the previous ball. But one's in form, the other's not. Amla absolutely cannons that through the covers, Smith had got an outside edge to third man. Complete contrast
a touch too wide this time, Amla doesn't have to bother chasing it, moved away as well, leaves it alone and it's a wide
oooh, Amla would have been worried for a second or two there, pitched up on the off stump and he slices it in front of point, was uppish but it landed in front of the fielder
goodish length on the off, gets forward and taps it in front of point
back of a length on the off, stands tall and punches it towards extra cover
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and plays it back to the bowler

shortish outside off, nicely timed by Smith, chops it past point, Razzak runs across from third man and dives to his left to haul it back in, they snatch three and Amla collides with Mushfiqur after completing the third run, no major damage done
short and wide and Amla senses a chance, slashes hard but misses
beautifully struck, on a length and it's crunched elegantly towards Shakib at extra cover, what a pity, Amla would think
slightly short on the off, turns in, rocks onto the back foot and punches it past midwicket for a single
he usually keeps them flat, shortish on the off, knocked back to the bowler off the back foot
slower through the air, Amla moves away and cracks that to cover
slightly short on the off again, Amla moves away and chops it towards cover
misfield at point, slower through the air again, short, cut towards point but the fielder there fumbles to allow them to snatch two
plays at that one a little loosely, pushes it towards point off the back foot
good length outside off, gets forward and pushes that to point
forces it on middle, a touch too straight but Smith can't quite cash in even though it's in his zone, driven straight to midwicket
that should give him lots of encouragement, full and wide and Smith leans forward to ease that through extra cover for a boundary, lovely timing
getting into his groove gradually is Smith, back of a length and he pulls it away wide of deep square leg for a couple more
slower one, lands slightly short on leg stump, turns it away past square leg for a single

edged but there's no slip, short of a good length, gets on the back foot to try to punch it past over, gets a thick outside edge and flies through the vacant slip region to the third-man boundary, Rubel's upset, but he knew there was no slip
tossed it up outside off, driven wide of mid-off for a quick single
slightly short on middle, Amla gets on the back foot and whips it to midwicket, Smith wants a single, what was he thinking?
floated it on middle and leg, worked away past midwicket for a single
shuffles across does Smith, Naeem targets middle and leg, Smith defends him to midwicket
looping it on the off stump, gets forward and drops it on the pitch
tosses it up on the off, lands on a length, reaches forward and defends him cautiously towards extra cover
quicker through the air, went with the arm, Amla opted to play it off the back foot, it appeared to keep a little low, he got his bat down in time
gets forward and he pushes it slightly uppishly past extra cover
appeal for run-out, Amla's comfortably in, comes down the track and drives it to mid-on, Shakib picks it up and aims accurately at the non-striker's end but no damage done for South Africa
short of a good length outside off, turned back in, Smith judged it well, left it be
slightly short on middle, gets across and taps it down to square leg
Smith comes down the track, takes it off a length and drives it down to long-on for a single
comes down the track and pushes it down to long-on for one more
gets a thick inside edge as it turns in and he tries to drive that through the line, rolls down to short fine
raises the 50-stand, comes down the track and knocks it towards long-on, steady partnership by the pair
slightly quicker through the air, on a good length on the off, gets forward and drops it on the off side

putting pressure on the fielder there, comes down the track and drives it wide of Tamim, quick single and Tamim fumbles and messes up an attempted throw at the non-striker's end. The ball slips out of his hand
turned away off the back foot to square leg
gets forward and drives it back to the bowler

referral, Harper's given it out as Smith tries to sweep it from outside off, lands outside off, turns in and Smith tries to sweep it square. Replays show there was no inside edge, but the impact was outside the line. Harper overturns his decision, was an on-field call but the impact was clearly outside off
gets forward and dabs that turning delivery into the leg side
punched off the back foot to the bowler
ooh, wasn;t too far from the leg stump, tried to sweep that short of a good length delivery really fine, got a touch to it but he almost swept it back onto this stumps
good over from Razzak, a maiden, gets back and works it to midwicket
flighted outside off, Amla beats the in-field with an elegant drive past extra cover for a couple of runs
pushed through the line to long-on for a single
short of a good length on leg,  walks across and clips it down to short fine leg
comes down the track, he;s done that consistently against the slow bowlers, works it away through square leg
short and Amla fails to cash in, steps away and punches it hard but straight to extra cover
squeezes it past midwicket down the ground for a single to keep strike
round the wicket and on Amla's pads, worked away past square leg for a single
short and Smith seizes the chance, waits for it to turn in and cuts it behind point, through the short-third man region for four welcome runs, used the pace well there
now steps down the track and drives it with the turn past a diving midwicket for a single
slightly short on leg stump, gets back and whips it through square leg for one more
flighted on middle, gets across and works it down to deep square leg
quicker delivery, pushes him on the back foot, it appears to stop on Amla for a moment, pushed past extra cover, Smith calls for a single and completes it easily
whipped off the back foot past square leg for a single
slightly short on middle, clipped through square leg for one more
punched down to long-on for one more
driven past the bowler towards long-on for one more
Amla's shot of the day, waited for it to turn in, had eyed his gap, made a bit of room and punched it into the vacant area between cover and extra cover, lovely timing

almost identical except that the previous one was all timing, this one had a bit more force behind it, turning in again and he made way to crunch that between cover and point, worries, plenty of them, for the hosts
tossed up outside off, gets forward and opens the face to play it behind point
comes down the track, yet again, pushes it down to long-on for a single
floating it on middle, driven back to the bowler
quicker through the air on the off stump, chopped past point for a single
leading edge as he turned the face a touch too early, expecting it to turn in, gets it wide of slip for a single
lands on a good length on leg stump, gave that a bit of air, Amla got back and dropped it into the leg side
short of a good length outside off, chopped towards point
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and plays it to midwicket
floating it on middle, turns the face to play it behind square leg
short of a good length on middle, punched past the bowler for a single
flighted on leg stump, chipped towards long-on for one more
keeping it flat that time, turned in a hint, got a big stride forward and played it to cover
slightly short on middle, punched down the ground to long-on
tires to whip it away fine, steals a quick single as it rolls down to short fine, the singles continue to flow
one more, waits for it, it's slightly short, punched down to long-on
tries to dab it into the leg side, gets a thick inside edge, a single wide of square leg
keeps a little low that, played away to midwicket from the crease
gave it some air and pushed it fuller, Smith drove at it but straight to extra cover
turned away off the back foot past square leg for a single
floating it on middle, gets forward and defends with bat close to pad
comes down the track and offers his pad, with the bat hidden behind
slightly short on the off, punched back to the bowler
shortish outside off, really slow through the air that ball, cracked to deep cover for a single
pushed past cover for a single to keep strike, and it's drinks
flighted on middle, steps away and drives that to extra cover
tight line on middle, comes down the track, Shakib alters his length, it's played back to the bowler

appeal for lbw, short on middle and leg, went back to punch it past midwicket, did he get an inside edge? It appeared to hit him in line, oh but replays show it would have missed leg. No referral anyway
played away to midwicket
good over so far, pushed off the back foot to extra cover
eased off the front foot wide of cover for a single to keep strike
pushed off the front foot towards extra cover
comes on to him very slowly, tickled off the back foot to square leg
whipped past square leg off the back foot for a single
short on the off, tries to crash it through the covers, mistimes it, Naeem does a good job at extra cover preventing the single with a dive
things have slowed down a bit here, pushed into the off side from the crease

the fielding has been sloppy today, Smith punched it to mid-on and called for the single, it would have ben tight had the fielder picked it up and aimed accurately, instead he fumbled and even allowed them a second run, Mahmudullah isn't happy
slightly short on the off, rocks back and cracks that past extra cover for a single
floated it on the off, closes the face slightly to play it back to the bowler
fetches it from well outside off and turns it away to midwicket
quicker delivery bowled on a length outside off, pushed past mid-off for a quick one
Amla almost botches up an attempted drive down the ground, got a thick inside edge instead
fired it quick on middle, knocked into the leg side for a single to keep strike
gets all the way back into the crease to tickle it past midwicket for a single to raise his half-century, he continues to have fun this World Cup
slightly short outside off, cracked towards point off the back foot
bowled flat on middle and off, dropped into the off side, no single on offer there

stumped, Smith danced down the track, Mahmudullah bowled well there, held back the length, it turned away as Smith tried to reach for it, Mushfiqur took it way to his left and Smith had a chance to get his bat back in. But he didn't ground it and didn't react quickly enough, Mushfiqur took off the bails to catch him short
slightly short on middle, pushed away to midwicket
Kallis off the mark, whipped past midwicket for a single to keep strike
flighted on middle, driven towards long-off for a single to raise the 100 for South Africa
Amla tries to squeeze that past extra cover, but can't
flat, bowled on a good length, struck hard towards deep cover for a single
angling in towards off from round the wicket, pushed straight to extra cover
a boundary in quite some time, waited for it, that was the key, turned away after pitching outside off and he cut it between point and cover
sliding it on the pads, nudged in front of short fine for a single
floating it on middle, defended back to the bowler from the crease
short on the off, punched towards deep cover for one more

he's dragged it on! Appeared to be a harmless delivery, slower through the air, dropped it short outside off, went back to play his favourite punch through cover, got an inside edge as it turned away, straight onto the stumps
he charges out of the track first up and flicks it to midwicket
short on the off, turning in, pushed back to the bowler
turning in from a good length outside off, dropped into the leg side
floats it on leg stump, nurdled past midwicket for a single
flighted on middle, lands full, Duminy opts to defend it into the leg side
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
slower through the air, holds its line, defended into the off side
pushed gently off the front foot towards extra cover
fullish on middle and leg, driven past midwicket for a single
almost bowled him round his legs there, turned in after pitching outside leg, Kallis tried to nudge it fine but missed, wide because it's down the leg side but it wasn't too far from leg stump
punched past cover for a single into the deep
fetches it from outside off to sweep it square but straight to the fielder
comes down the track, takes it on the full and drives it to long-on
Kallis comfortably whips that away to deep square leg for a single
full outside off, drilled through extra cover for a couple of runs in the deep as deep cover runs across to cut it off
ooh, Razzak sensed he would come down and bowled it slightly wide, Duminy had to reach for it and he eventually chipped it, just over the bowler, for a single
comes down the track and pushes it down to long-on for a single
fires it quick on middle, played to cover, Duminy wants the single but Kallis rightly sends him back
drives it towards Naeem at extra cover but can't get it past his dive
driven down the ground to long-off for a single
waits for it to turn in and dabs it behind point for a quick single
looping in towards middle, pats it easily towards long-off for a isngle
shortish on middle, tickled off the back foot wide of short fine for a quick single
short outside off, cracked towards Naeem at extra cover who fumbles this time to allow a single
gets front and across and plays it towards midwicket
lets out a grunt as he delivers that, gave it some air, pushed to midwicket again
holds back the length, Kallis gets back and punches it back to th ebowler
waits for it to turn in and bunts that wide of point for a single
back of a length outside off, runs it down to third man for a single
back of a length on middle, Duminy gets back and defends it down the pitch
shortish on leg stump, nice placement, nudged it in front of fine leg, the fielder was quite deep and that gave them enough time to get back for the second
shortish outside off, guided down to third man for a single
good length on the off, pushed towards extra cover
back of a length outside off, knocked down towards point, a tidy over from Rubel
tossed up on the off, driven down towards long-on for a single
angling in towards middle, gets forward and pushes it to extra cover
gets forward and guides it towards point
found the gap, short, seized the length early, rocked back, waited for it to turn away and slapped that past the diving extra cover for a boundary
run-out attempt, confusion, it's nudged to mid-on, Duminy didn't want the single and sent Kallis back who was ball-watching, made it back in the end, a direct hit would still have had him in
cracked wide of sweeper cover for a single
short of a good length on the off, run down to third man for a single
back of a length on the off, punched off  the back foot past mid-off
nicely timed, pushed it firmly off the back foot, aimed to get it past extra cover but Imrul Kayes did well to stop that diving to his left, fell on the ball but no damage done
superbly driven, drove it on the up, good length and he just rocked forward to thread it between mid-off and extra cover for a boundary
similar shot but didn't have the timing to back it up, wide of mid-off for a single

that's out, Duminy has faltered off what was a poor ball, it's a short ball down the leg side and was there for the taking, was trying to send it down the fine-leg boundary, it caught the glove and Mushfiqur made no mistake behind the stumps
misfield by midwicket, fullish on middle and leg and it was driven through the leg side, the fumble, with the mid-on up, gave South Africa three runs
dropped into the off side for a single wide of cover
pushed on the up into the off side
targeting middle, bowled short of a good length, punched into the leg side in the direction of midwicket
lovely shot by Kallis, presented the full face, good length and he just stroked it through the line to beat the diving mid-on
short of a good length on the off, Kallis rocks back and punches it to mid-off
slightly short on middle, nudged into the leg side behind square for a single
edged, no slip, turned away and Kallis had opened his face slightly to play it to point but that went finer than intended, two more
tossed it up on the off, driven straight to extra cover
opened the face there to play it towards third man
defended off the front foot wide of extra cover for an easy single
shortish on middle, turned away past square leg for a single
slightly short of a good length on the off, pushed towards mid-off from the crease
came down the track, fetched it from outside off to nudge it down wide of third man, rushed back for the second and completed it easily in the end
gets across and flicks it away towards deep square leg for a single
good length outside off, square-driven towards Shuvo at point, who prevents the single
slower one bowled full on the pads, clipped off the pads through midwicket into the deep for a couple more
gets on the front foot, slightly across, and punches it straight to midwicket
short of a good length on the off, gets back and drops it in front of midwicket
got some reverse there, good length on the off, driven firmly but straight to mid-on
slightly short on the off, gets across and knocks it down in front of midwicket
turned away off the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
short and wide, was the slower one, cut straight to point
good over from Rubel, some reverse again, lands on a length, it's a full-fledged Kallis drive but straight to extra cover
slightly short on middle, worked away wide of square leg for a single
gets across and nudges it past square leg for one more
slightly short on middle, pulled through square leg into the deep for a single
that square-leg region has been exploited quite a bit, another single there
pushed past midwicket for one more
waits for it to turn in and turns the face but can't get it past short third
short of a good length outside off, smacked towards extra cover
short and wide, cut away past a diving point for a couple of runs
pushed away towards midwicket off the back foot
ooh some bounce, kicked off the pitch and du Plessis did well to take one hand off that, played it down towards short third for a quick single
played towards extra cover off the back foot
short outside off, chopped down towards point, can't get it past Shuvo there
slower through the air, shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and whips it to square leg but can't get the single
plenty of power behind that, short on the off, rocks back and thwacks it past extra cover, there is a deep cover in place but he had no chance
floating it on middle and off, reaches forward and defends
gets on the back foot, shortish on middle and off, played to extra cover
floated outside off, reaches forward and drives it past extra cover for a single

misfield by Razzak proves costly, concedes four, plenty of fumbles today, short and Kallis cuts it towards point, Razzak allows it to roll through his legs to the ropes, misfielding off the captain's bowling is best avoidable
short of a good length on the oiff, punched towards extra cover
dabs it off the back foot wide of point for a single
Kallis knocks it down in front of cover for a quick single
a touch risky playing that fullish delivery off the back foot, defended to cover
fires it into the blockhole on middle, dug out back to the bowler
gets back and works it away past square leg for a single
horrible ball first up, short ball on leg stump, du Plessis swivels and helps that on its way past short fine leg for a boundary
pitched up outside off, gave it  some air, dug out towards extra cpver
targeting middle and off, gets across and pushes it back to the bowler
worked away off the back foot past midwicket for a single
Kallis tries to crash that through point, was slightly short and the shot seemed on but it spun back in to beat the swing of the bat
fullish on the pads, eased past midwicket into the deep for a single
shortish on middle and leg, nudged it past square leg into the deep, thought about a second but it wasnt on
gets on the back foot and plays it towards square leg
short delivery down the leg side, called a wide
gets across and dabs it past square leg for one more
slightly short on leg stump, played past square leg for one more to raise the 50-stand
slightly short on middle and leg, turns the face and knocks it down into the leg side
played it in front of square leg to collect a single
Kallis gets forward to that flighted delivery and pushes it to midwicket
flighted, gets to th epitch and pushes it to midwicket again
leading edge as he tried to play that again towards midwicket, it didn't turn much and instead went past the bowler, he got a single for his efforts there
rocks on the back foot and knocks it in front of square leg for a single
slightly short outside off, dropped into the off side, called for a single but du Plessis rightly sent him back
lands on leg stump and turns down further, called a wide
gets back and across and presses it away into the leg side for a single to keep strike
raises his half-century does Kallis with a whip wide of short fine leg, belated applause from the crowd, one of them needs to step up now, nicely-paced innings, risk free
worked away past square leg into the deep for a single
shortish on middle, plays it past midwicket for a single
tries to open the face there but it doesn't turn in, was trying to play it behind short third, didn't connect
kept a little low, punched it past extra cover to bring up the 200
flicked away into the deep through square leg for a single
flighted on the off, driven back down the pitch to the bowler
made room and Naeem followed him, it was whipped through midwicket into the deep for a single
short outside off, cut away towards deep point for one more
Kallis goes after it and succeeds, tossed up and he sensed his chance, came down the track and bent low to slog-sweep it over deep midwicket for a maximum
slightly short on middle and leg, knocked through square leg for a single
slightly short on the off, slapped down to long-on for a single
short from round the wicket, pulled to deep square leg for a single
gets across to nudge it to short fine, steals a quick single
back of a length on middle and off, gets back and drops it wide of square leg for a single
powerfully swept, slightly short from round the wicket on middle, he smacked it hard over square leg for a one bounce four
excellent running, pushed it gently past extra cover, the fielder in the deep took a while to get to it and they completed the second with ease
plays it away through square leg off the back foot for a single
short on middle, punched down the ground to long-on
played away off the back foot past square leg for a single

Kallis falls, short and it took forever to get to him, tried to smack it through extra cover off the back foot, was expecting it to turn away but it went straight on, instead of extra cover it went straight into the palms of Shakib Al Hasan, who took it on the second attempt
quick single on the off side, played it off the back foot wide of cover

short ball down the leg side, tries to clip it square, misses, it's called a wide, Mushfiqur has appealed for a stumping as du Plessis did leave the crease for just a moment. The appeal for the stumping has been turned on but the review is for a caught-behind. Replays show there is definitely a deflection, but we can't really make out for sure if that was off the thigh pad or the bat. There is no Hot Spot. It's really difficult to make out. It's definitely not a wide, that's for sure. But even close-up replays are inconclusive. The benefit of the doubt goes to the batsman in the end. The wide has been reversed. Worth a review, definitely, but lack of technology the problem this time.
worked away off the back foot through square leg for a single
short ball on middle and off, punched hard but straight to cover
short and he connects it well, rocked back and pulled it high and handsome over long-on, came off the meat, poor delivery
another short delivery, short on middle and he rocks back to pull it over midwicket for a one-bounce four

unfortunate this time is Razzak, hurried onto the batsman, was the arm ball, and kept low as well. du Plessis got low and his bat down in time, it took the inside edge, went past short fine, Shafiul chased well and dived but his body made contact with the ropes as he was trying to drag it back in
worked away off the back foot wide of square leg for a single
punched down the ground to long-on for a single, a good over for South Africa
swept hard from van Wyk, Tamim does well to run to his left and cut that off in the deep
edged, was tossed up, tried to drive that over extra cover, spun away to take the outside edge, just a single to short third man
comes down the track, had made his mind up, got to the pitch and chipped it over mid-on for a couple of runs

bowled'im, kept low, came forward and then rocked back to a good length delivery, it didn't turn and he didn't really know what to do with it in the end, failed to get his bat down, got an underedge onto the pads and then onto the stumps
floating it around off stump, defended towards point
slightly short, moves back and punches it past extra cover for a couple of runs
getting it to reverse but slightly misdirected, strayed on the pads but du Plessis couldn't glance it down fine
full toss on middle, worked away to deep midwicket for a single
Are South Africa slipping up here? Full toss and he chips it straight into the hands of Tamim at mid-off, three wickets for not many this Powerplay
edged and four, he would be familiar with that shot, inside edge as he went for a pull over midwicket, went instead to the fine-leg boundary, 250 up for South Africa
pushed off the front foot towards mid-off for a quick single
Botha plays the scoop and it pays off, there is a short fine leg in place but he just managed to evade him, full on middle and leg and he scoops it over the in-field to the ropes
quick single, was a full toss, Peterson came down the track and punched it to mid-off
slower one bowled short outside off, chopped wide of extra cover for a single
Peterson gets it past short fine, slower one bowled down the leg side, was a poor delivery and Peterson swings it over that fielder for four more
smashed, a poor full toss outside off and he absolutely creams it between mid-off and extra cover for a boundary
slower one and another inside edge bit this one rolls down in the direction of square leg, tried to make room and loft him over extra cover
Botha cases in on a length ball, pitched up on the off and he hammers that over mid-off to complete the Powerplay on a high for South Africa
run-out, in the blockhole outside off, Peterson digs it out, Botha wants the single, Peterson sends him back, Rubel collects and throws down the stumps at his end to catch Botha short
Peterson's enjoying himself here, length ball and he moved away to loft it beautifully over mid-off for a boundary

the ramp shot again, slower one bowled short outside off, gets across and scoops it over short fine, didn't quite get hold of it, nevertheless they get three as Kayes slipped while trying to chase it down, they've got to 280

bowled first ball, short of a good length on middel, tried to punch it past midwicket, missed, it clipped his pads and then crashed into the stumps, flurry of wickets at the death but also amid a flurry of boundaries
good delivery, banged in short outside off, Tsotsobe didn't play at it, backed away, that's a dot ball
clubs it down the ground, that was a short delivery on middle and he swatted it back past the bowler to collect a boundary

inn2.comm: lands this on the middle and it goes towards leg and middle, defended carefully to the on side
similar line and length, swept to square-leg.
Fine shot. It was a tad quicker, and sliding in towards off stump, Tamim rocks back to cut it through point.
much better delivery; slower, lands it on a length on the middle, dabbed to the leg side
nicely flighted on a length on the middle, defended to the on side.
fuller, lands on the middle line, Tamim jabs it out back down the track.
moves in towards the pad and it rolls away of the pad to fine-leg boundary. Wrong line. Quick outfield.
on the middle stump line, defended to the on side of the pitch
homing in on the off and middle stump line, pushed out to cover
banged in short of length and it skids past the thigh pad and down the leg side. There was an appeal for a catch and replays show why; it hit the thigh pad
a fiery bouncer from Lonwabo and the batsman ducks and gets a glare from the bowler
gets forward to drive to mid-off

Thump! Crowd love it. He moved outside leg stump and waited in position. The ball was full and on the stumps and the bat swung down, met the ball flush on the middle and it went sailing over extra cover. One bounce and over the rope
on the leg stump line, goes past the prod and runs away of the pad
fuller, straighter, nudged to the on side
just outside the off stump, much slower and that defeats the timing.. its been mishit to the cover region
gets back to deflect this to square-leg fielder.
slower, on the middle and off line, driven to long-off

lands on the leg stump line and Kayes thinks he can work it to the on side. Seemed a natural thing to do but suddenly the ball turns and bounces and he gets a leading edge to the off. No one close on the off and it rolls away to safety
full in length and on the off stump line, leans across to defend
gets forward to push this past the bowler

Shout for a catch by the keeper They have gone for the udrs after the ump turned it down. It was the bouncer on the off stump line and Tamim was early in to the pull shot. There was a big noise - the bottom edge i reckon. Lets see what the third ump says; he says that's out. Harper reverses his decision. Tamim is back to the hut.
short in length outside off, punched out to the off
leans forward to defend a full delivery. Lonwabo was trying to trap him lbw there.
comes in from outside off, edges his defensive push to the on side
flighted full on the middle, teasing delivery, Kayes defends.
from wide of the crease, on the pads, rolls away behind square-leg
lands full on a length outside off and moves in with the arm, pushed out to the on side
lovely delivery,, fuller and quicker,  Junaid was in trouble, , he didnt pick the length or that it was coming in and just about managed to stab it away
slower, turns away, pushed out to the off. Good over so far
Absolutely top quality over this. Flighted on the middle stump line, Kayes defends.
full in length, moving in towards that lbw thing again, Junaid edges it to the on side, he needs to be careful.

Supah delivery. this one is a bouncer and it catches Junaid completely by surprise. here he was trying to be careful about not getting lbw and this is a well-directed bouncer. he manages to play a weak pull, top edges it but it lands safely
really full delivery and it almost breached the defences of Kayes, who gets an inside edge on the drive to his pad

Clatter! What a way to go! he didn't offer a shot and heard the death knell. he is stunned. Lonwabo is delirious. It landed full in length outside off and cut back in. Kayes shouldered arms and surrendered his wicket.
leans across to defend and is hit on the pad. Shout for lbw He got that front foot outside off and was struck outside off
cuts in from outside off, left alone. Wonder whether Nafees had a moment of self doubt while leaving that one
full delivery on the middle, driven to the off
skids on towards off stump, steered to point
slightly short in length and Nafees rocks back to cut  it through point.
gets well  back to dab this to the on side
full and on the middle and leg, worked past midwicket

Trapped! Looked Plumb. It landed full on a length around off and came in with the arm and hit him in front of the stumps. It would have hit the leg stump. Very tentative push from the batsman. He was neither forward nor back. He should have come forward to play that full delivery and then was beaten by the arm ball. He now goes for UDRS. OUT is the verdict
from wide of the crease, full in length on the off stump line, defended back down the track
full in length outside off, dabbed to point
hops back to ride the bounce and he defends
leans across, covers the off stump and shoulders arms
short in length and outside off, Nafees goes for a pull shot but makes no contact
Lonwabo is taking out Bangladesh here. It was slightly slower, lands full on a length outside off and cuts in. Nafees played a very loose drive, away from the body, and gets the inside edge.
starts from round the stumps, on the middle, turned to square-leg
full in length and outside off, dabbed to point
full in length on the off, driven to mid-off
low full toss, driven to the off side of the pitch
stays back to steer it to backward point
short and wide, cut hard but its intercepted at point
presses back to defend to the off side
lovely straight drive. It was full and on the middle and off, Shakib unfurled a superb straight drive to the boundary
a bouncer that flies over the leg stump line, Shakib lets it go over him
leans forward to drive to mid-off

Bang! It was the bouncer and Shakib loves to play the pull. he swivels to crash it through midwicket. I remember a Test match in West Indies where they bowled quite a few bouncers at Shakib, who kept pulling them away
leans forward to drive it past the bowler who stares at Shakib. The crowd roar.
from round the stumps, full in length outside off, mistimes the drive to the off side
comes in towards the off stump, still from round the stumps, nudged to the on side
just outside the off stump, run down to third man
stays back to defend to cover
on a length on the middle stump line, defended to the off side
full in length on the middle stump, tapped to the on side
on the middle stump line, dabbed to the on side
goes down the track to defend to the off
presses back to cut to cover
gets well back to defend to the bowler
drags this short, just outside leg, Rahim pulls but ends up dragging it to short fine-leg
slower, outside off, cut to left of backward point where Ingram makes a fine diving stop
stays back to defend a delivery homing in on the off stump line
another bouncer and Shakib pulls it down to deep square-leg fielder
from round the stumps on the thigh pad, rolls behind square-leg
on the off stump line, from over the wicket to the lefty, defended on the back foot
pushes this out to cover
leans forward to work to midwicket
flighted full on the middle, driven back to the bowler
goes on with the arm, on the middle, punched back to the bowler
slower, fuller, eased to mid-off
on the middle stump line, from round the stumps, nudged to the off
on the leg stump line, worked away to backward square-leg fielder
gets back to turn this to deep square-leg region
on the off stump line, defended to the off
full in length outside off and Shakib drives to sweeper cover
bouncer from round the stumps, steered down to third man
short in length and outside off, punched out to cover
gets back to turn this to short midwicket
in the zone outside off, Shakib goes for a drive and is beaten, as he drives inside the line

What a catch by the skipper! Lovely delivery, mind you. It was flighted on a length around off, lured rahim forward into a push-drive before it turned away to get the edge. The ball was well to the right of first slip and was dying when Smith lunged out to pouch it with his right hand. Supah
tossed up full in a length on the middle, defended to the off
on the middle, defended to midwicket
tossed up around off, and it came in with the arm; the batsman went for the drive, pushed outside the line and edged it to the leg side
turns away from middle and off, defended to silly point fielder
quicker one, on the middle, turned behind square-leg
slip in. tossed up on the middle, nudged to the on side

swats this from outside off into vacant spaces in midwicket. The bowler rushes after it. Shakib turns back for two. The throw wasn't accurate, the keeper had to get forward and reach the batsman's front crease to take it and flick it back to the stumps but by then Shakib was home
flighted outside off, on a length, steered to point
flighted full outside off, a tentative prod and he is beaten
outside the off stump, dabbed to point region
tossed up outside off, slow through the air, driven to deep cover
flighted full outside off, driven to mid-off
googly around off, pushed out to point
flighted around off, full, driven to mid-off
full again, driven to short extra cover
slightly short in length, just outside off, cut away to deep point
flighted outside off, full, Mahmudullah drives wide of sweeper cover for couple of runs
tossed up outside off, pushed to cover
fuller, on the middle, worked around to midwicket
flighted on the middle and leg, turns to hit the pad
tossed up on the off, pushed back to the bowler
quicker, toppie outside off, punched out to mid-off
slower, turns down leg, worked behind square-leg
full and down the leg side. Wide
on the middle stump line, defended very carefully
low full toss on the middle, driven to long-off
Fab strike. it was tossed up, perhaps too full , outside off and Shakib creams it through extra cover
lunges forward to nudge this leg break to the on side
googly from outside off, cut to point
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
slow in the air, outside off, pushed out to the off
full in length but Shakib decides to go for the cut and slashes it wide of Smith at first slip
dips on Shakib who lunges forward to defend
turns away from the off, from a good length, Shakib tries to steer it to point and edges it to the off
dabs this from outside off to the leg side
turns in to the off, nudged to the on side
gets forward to dab this to midwicket
leans forward to flick it again to midwicket

Mahmudullah is run out quicker one around off, full in length, late cut to right of short third man where Botha makes a fine diving save. he searches for the ball, finds it, turns and fires a throw to the keeper who breaks the stumps. Great work from Botha.
leans forward to defend to the leg side
short in length outside off, cut to cover
gets forward to deflect this to midwicket
lovely flighted delivery that dips on Shakib who pushes it out to the off
too full and Shakib pings sweeper cover
leans forward to deflect this to short-leg
leans forward to drive to mid-off
full in length, eased to mid-off
ooh .. leg break from the middle and off line, the batsman is neither forward nor back and edges it short of slip
full, on the legs, swept away to fine-leg
leans forward to nudge to the on side
stays back to work it to the on side

Edge and gone! Captain falls. It was slightly quicker and turns in from outside off stump, Shakib is cramped for the room there but decides to go through with the cut shot and gets a thick edge. Morne van wyk takes it on the rebound. The end is nigh.
slip, backward short-leg and silly point watch the batsman lean forward to defend

Clatter! What is happening out there? The innings is in complete shambles. It was a flighted delivery on the leg stump line and Shafiul goes for a big slog sweep. Thin air. The leg stump is pegged back.
turns from outside leg, dabbed aerially past the squarish short leg
slower, flighted on the off and middle, defended to the off
leans well forward to defend to the off
drives this to sweeper cover for a single. Slip in a googly i say
here comes the googly but it beats the bat, He needs to slip that one against the Righty as well

It's all ending very quickly. If you are a Bangladesh fan, way too quickly. some prefer it slow, Bangladesh have gone for a quick end. Razzak plays a slog sweep and finds the man at deep midwicket. Stunning implosion.
gets forward to stab this to theo n side
pushes this back to the bowler
on the leg stump line, turned to the on side
And again.
quicker, flatter, arm ball, gets back to defend
down the track and heaves this past mid-on
leans well forward to defend
on the middle stump line, turned to fine-leg region
flighted full outside leg, left alone and it turns back in and the keeper collects
presses back to clip it past square-leg
flighted on the middle, lofted over the bowler
gets forward to stab this to the on side
slightly short in length, cut to point
leans well forward to defend to the off
full and on the middle, turned past short -leg
on the leg and middle line, tapped back to the bowler
goes back to force it to the left of mid-off and past Lonwabo
leans well forward to defend it back down the track

Castled! The implosion is complete. A sorry end to their campaign . It was the quicker one that skidded on towards the middle, the batsman went for the cut shot but missed. They collapsed against West Indies, came back to pull off a thriller against England but have surrendered very meekly here. That's that. This is their lowest score against South Africa. Who will be the fall guy for this campaign? Jamie Siddons? Shakib's captaincy? The corridors of power are going to be abuzz in the days to come.
